page.title: 15Church work in Cupar
page.content: Although there are four different denominations the ministers in Cupar are working towards{unity between the {denominations}and{united services}are held quite often. Throughout the summer the two{Church of Scotland churches combine their congregations and hold{united services}every Sunday. The{Youth Fellowship}takes an active part in the church and its members have taken part in church services on several occasions. It also has close links with the{Youth Fellowship}in Newport_on_Tay and 20 of these{young {people}are touring the west coast of America with an American choir, the Great Day. 1985 sees the Bi_Centenary of Cupar Old and St. Michael of Tarvit Parish Church and special services are being held to celebrate this.
